title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal website showcasing my projects and skills.

title: Pong Game
description: A classic two-player arcade game implemented in Python using the Turtle graphics library.

title: Snake Game
description: A snake game where the player controls a growing snake while avoiding collisions.

title: Content-Based Recommender System
technology: Python, Tkinter, scikit-learn, nltk, pandas, numpy
description: A movie recommender system that suggests similar movies based on metadata using cosine similarity.

title: Advanced Text Editor with AI-Powered Word Prediction
technology: Python, Tkinter, TensorFlow, numpy, regex, python-docx
description: A modern text editor with AI-based word prediction, rich text formatting, and theme customization.

title: Hindi Character Recognition System
technology: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Pillow, NumPy, Matplotlib, Tkinter
description: A deep learning-based system using CNN for recognizing handwritten Hindi characters with Hinglish pronunciation support.

title: HOLD-MA-KEES Password Manager
description: A simple password manager that generates and stores secure passwords alongside website and email/username information.

title: Speed Typing Trainer
description: A typing speed trainer that helps users improve their typing accuracy and speed through difficulty-based challenges, time limits, and performance tracking.

title: Tor IP Changer
description: A script that changes the public IP address every 10 seconds using the Tor network by sending a signal to request a new IP.

title: Spotify Playlist Recommendation App
description: An application that authenticates with the Spotify API to fetch playlists and generate personalized song recommendations based on user playlists.

title: Stone Paper Scissors Simulation
description: A visual simulation of the Stone, Paper, Scissors game using Turtle graphics, showcasing object interactions, movement, and transformations in a bounded environment.

title: Barcode and QR Code Generator with Tkinter
description: A Python application with a Tkinter-based GUI for generating, customizing, and scanning QR codes and barcodes. Supports color customization and image saving.

title: Bengali Sentiment Analysis
technology: Python, Tkinter, scikit-learn, numpy, pandas, nltk, re
description: A sentiment analysis tool for Bengali text that preprocesses data, removes stop words, and uses a trained machine learning model to predict sentiment. The application includes a Tkinter-based GUI for user interaction.

title: AUTO Email Spam Checker
technology: Python, IMAP, scikit-learn, Tkinter, numpy, pandas, threading
description: A Python application that continuously monitors a Gmail inbox, fetches emails, and classifies them as spam or ham using a machine learning model. Spam emails are moved to the Spam folder, and their subjects are logged.

title: LoFi-Mix Audio Processor
description: A Python script that processes audio files to generate a final mix with lo-fi, vintage effects, rain sounds, and a piano overlay. It dynamically extends the mix duration while ensuring smooth transitions with fade-in and fade-out effects.
